name: Fervent Flames
desc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time. Increases ATK by 25%.

name: Soothing Water
desc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time. Increases incoming healing by 30%.

name: Impetuous Winds
desc: Decreases Stamina Consumption by 15%. Increases Movement SPD by 10%. Shortens Skill CD by 5%.

name: High Voltage
desc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time. Superconduct, Overloaded, and Electro-Charged have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle (CD: 5s).

name: Shattering Ice
desc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time. Increases CRIT Rate against opponents that are Frozen or affected by Cryo by 15%.

name: Enduring Rock
desc: Increases shield strength by 15%. Additionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characteristics: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemies will decrease their Geo RES by 20% for 15s.
